title: lagoon front land at tangalle
details: Prime lagoon front land situated at tangalle. one acres land with brand new, luxury,modern 2 story villa and beautiful view of lagoon. There is a property with electricity and water supply available. 1.5km a way from matara Hambantota main road and easy access to the property. 700 m to beach and 3.5km to Tangalla town. Very calm area surround with nature. Ideal place for nature hotel project or aurveda resort. Clear deeds.
